name: moca
description: Moca â€” Multi-agent Orchestration Chat on AgentCore

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@moca/tool-definitions && npm run build --workspace=@moca/s3-workspace-sync && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test: npm run build --workspace=@moca/tool-definitions && npm run build --workspace=@moca/s3-workspace-sync && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.dev: npm run build --workspace=@moca/tool-definitions && npm run build --workspace=@moca/s3-workspace-sync && concurrently -n "frontend,backend,agent" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm:frontend:dev" "npm:backend:dev" "npm:agent:dev"
scripts.devw: npm run setup-env && npm run build --workspace=@moca/tool-definitions && npm run build --workspace=@moca/s3-workspace-sync && concurrently -n "frontend,backend,agent" -c "cyan,magenta,yellow" "npm:frontend:dev" "npm:backend:dev" "npm:agent:dev"
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run setup-env && npm run frontend:dev
scripts.dev:backend: npm run setup-env && npm run backend:dev
scripts.dev:agent: npm run setup-env && npm run agent:dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambda && npm run deploy --workspace=@moca/cdk
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:lambda && npm run deploy:dev --workspace=@moca/cdk
scripts.deploy:stg: npm run build:lambda && npm run deploy:stg --workspace=@moca/cdk
scripts.deploy:prd: npm run build:lambda && npm run deploy:prd --workspace=@moca/cdk
scripts.client: npm run client:build && npm run client:start
